data.title: The Magic Flute
data.meta_description: The Magic Flute - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides a study guide for Pacific Opera Victoria's upcoming production of Mozart's The Magic Flute. It includes background information on the opera's composers, premiere, and historical context. It gives a brief 3 sentence summary of the plot, describes some of the main themes and musical elements, and provides resources for further learning. The guide is intended to help teachers and students prepare for attending the performance.
